dialogue.messageText: It’s like flooding outside! What happened to the weather report? I thought this depression was supposed to pass.

dialogue.answerText: Yeah, we all thought so too. That’s what I read online this morning. I missed my office for this too.

dialogue.messageText: I guess a thunderstorm is on its way too.

dialogue.answerText: Can we go inside? I am already half wet!

dialogue.messageText: Hey! How did your English test go?

dialogue.answerText: Not really bad, thanks. I’m just glad that all the exams are over! How about you …how’d your practical examination go?

dialogue.messageText: Oh, it went really well. I can’t thank you enough for helping me with it! I owe you a treat for that.

dialogue.answerText: It’s my pleasure. So … Do you feel like preparing a bit for the React exam scheduled for next week?

dialogue.messageText: Yeah, sure! Meet me at the library after 7 then?

dialogue.answerText: All right. I’ll bring my notes too then.

dialogue.messageText: Sure. See you then. Bye.
